column5: I am taking a break from Twitter until further notice. You can get updates on my professional activities via Linkedin!

It's my publication day! As a first time author, I didn't know a day like this existed, but I just received congratulations from¬†@MeredithNorwich -¬†my friendly editor in the US. It means my book can now be ordered from your favorit‚Ä¶https://t.co/FiPVOJOEEr https://t.co/GQm44Ivqqh

My university lecturing season has started again and what a joy to do this F2F again and not virtual like the past two years. What's new this year: I've never had so many students send me a connection request here on Linkedin after just one lecture... qui‚Ä¶https://t.co/n5R8xa7isx

I love non-standard keynote requests: 'How about conducting a 120 minute session for 400+ people?' My recipe: I threw a keynote, a workshop and a quiz show in a blender and added some music and solar powered headphones on top. With the help of CEO Johan T‚Ä¶https://t.co/kzHdNRJmcY
@jsundlo Thanks Johannes! And: can you let me know which Metaverse that is?

'Shaping Tomorrow's Leadership together.' And that's exactly what Stan Steverink and I did here at The Circle event here in Amsterdam today. Deep diving into two topics: The Polycrisis and Future Collaboration - with a wonderfully engaged group of HR (Dev‚Ä¶https://t.co/8uT76GnKgY

Tusen takk‚Ä¶https://t.co/osomkZILd8

Quite exciting news. A month from now, my first book comes out! It's called: 'Future Human Behavior - understanding what people are going to do next'.¬†It compiles the best of my thinking, research and work with clients into six thematic chapters.¬†¬†

It's‚Ä¶https://t.co/hikk6eqvKC
